title: Britney Spears shows off her taut bod at the gym as she shares an inspirational message
text:
Britney Spears recently enjoyed a gorgeous vacation in Hawaii, which she shared with her millions of Instagram followers.

But now that she's back home, she's back on her daily grind, which includes maintaining her taut bod.

She took to Instagram once again Thursday to share a glimpse at her gym routine, as well as an inspirational message.

Gym bunny: Britney Spears took to Instagram once again Thursday to share a glimpse at her gym routine, as well as an inspirational message

The 37-year-old sported a turquoise sports bra with a pair of short blue gym shorts, showing off her toned tummy and legs.

She posted a video of herself doing some acrobatic stretches, one that involved a perfect split.

One photo shows her balancing on an aerobics ball as she stretches her arms in the air.

She also posted a couple photos of herself from behind as she lifted a barbell over her head.

Serving body: The 37-year-old sported a turquoise sports bra with a pair of short blue gym shorts, showing off her toned tummy and legs

Extreme stretching: She posted a video of herself doing some acrobatic stretches, one that involved a perfect split

Time to bounce: One photo shows her balancing on an aerobics ball as she stretches her arms in the air

It came with an inspirational message in the caption: 'I get so excited when I lift the bar. I’ve done it one other time in a private room but never with a lot of people around!!!!

'I was at Equinox here and my legs were shaking… until a guy walked by and said “Go for it," so I did it!!! Just think about it... that one guy changed my whole day because he believed in me for literally two seconds!!!!!'

She added: 'If you're out there in this big world today I thank you for telling me to go for it!!!'

She lifts, bro: She also posted a couple photos of herself from behind as she lifted a barbell over her head

Go for it: It came with an inspirational message in the caption: 'If you're out there in this big world today I thank you for telling me to go for it!!!'

The Toxic artist recently returned from Maui, where she posted a gorgeous image of her on the beach.

While there, she ditched her brunette hair to restore her signature blonde look, which she shared with her followers.

She posted a short video of herself showing off the look, writing: 'So maybe blondes do have more fun.'

Tropical getaway: The Toxic artist recently returned from Maui, where she posted a gorgeous image of her on the beach
description: The If U Seek Amy artist recently returned from Maui, where she posted a gorgeous image of her on the beach. While there, she ditched her brunette hair to restore her signature blonde look.
